metatags.og:description: thenextadventure on March 12, 2024: "🎮 Meet Arknights’ mafia princess operator, Lin Yuxia, a capable but mysterious Phalanx caster from Lungmen who can manipulate sand a..."
metatags.twitter:title: Artemis Snow 雪瑩 (@thenextadventure) • Instagram photos and videos
metatags.og:title:
Artemis Snow 雪瑩 on Instagram: "🎮 Meet Arknights’ mafia princess operator, Lin Yuxia, a capable but mysterious Phalanx caster from Lungmen who can manipulate sand and glass!⁣
⁣
It was such a fun and dynamic experience weaving in my Cantonese roots with her English lines. While creating the voice performance for Lin, I fell in love with her aloof but whimsical personality as well as her pensive nature and secretly compassionate side. ⁣
⁣
As always, thank you to my amazing team @vox_inc_usa and for the creative collaborative opportunity with @arknights_messenger_official .⁣
⁣
Arknights 明日方舟 is a free-to-play tactical RPG/tower defense mobile game developed by Hypergryph set in a fantasy world with the most interesting characters.⁣
⁣
#arknights #mobilegame #明日方舟 #linyuxia #linarknights #arknightsoperator #VoiceOver #voiceartist #yostar #hypergryph #anime #gaming #arknightsglobal #アークナイツ"

metatags.twitter:description:
NOW FEATURING The Bass Mafia Little Larry Spoon was designed in conjunction with Bass Mafia and BASS Elite Chris Zaldain. It features exaggerated cupping for enhanced cradling action on the fall, but more importantly, a heavier thump when stroked. Same great colors as the Big Larry Spoon! 
Decoy hook tied with flashabou.
3/4oz oz, 5" Spoon, 6" total length with flashabou.

metatags.og:description: बानमेर में नगर परिषद चौराहा के पास हर दिन रेत की अवैध मंडी लगती है। पुलिस ने रेत से भरे ट्रैक्टर-ट्रालियों के खिलाफ कार्रवाई करने की योजना बनाई। अवैध रेत की मंडी लगाने वाले ट्रैक्टर-ट्रालियों की धरपकड़ की योजना बनाते हुए पुलिस ने बानमोर के पास 40-50 रेत से भरी ट्रैक्टर-ट्राली की घेराबंदी शुरू कर दी।  तकरीबन पांच किलोमीटर तक पुलिस की गाड़ियों  ने रेत माफिया का पीछा किया।
metatags.twitter:creator: @jagrannews

title: Trainee IFS officer threatened with murder by Uttarkhand mining mafia
htmlTitle: Trainee IFS officer threatened with murder by Uttarkhand mining mafia

metatags.twitter:title: Trainee IFS officer threatened with murder by Uttarkhand mining mafia
metatags.og:title: Trainee IFS officer threatened with murder by Uttarkhand mining mafia
metatags.og:description: Ramnagar (Uttarakhand), May 4 (ANI): The mining mafia operating in Uttarakhand has threatened trainee IFS officer Kalyani Bisht with murder if she refuses to end her enquiries into their illegal activities.  "We received information that illegal mining was taking place, so, we took a flying squad and a range squad to investigate.  This incident takes place soon after IAS officer D K Ravi, who took on the sand mafia in Karnataka's Kolar District, was found dead under mysterious circumstances at his home in Bengaluru.
metatags.news_keywords: illegal mining, Kalyani Bisht, ANI, IFS officer, Uttarakhand, illegal activities
metatags.twitter:description: Ramnagar (Uttarakhand), May 4 (ANI): The mining mafia operating in Uttarakhand has threatened trainee IFS officer Kalyani Bisht with murder if she refuses to end her enquiries into their illegal activities.  "We received information that illegal mining was taking place, so, we took a flying squad and a range squad to investigate.  This incident takes place soon after IAS officer D K Ravi, who took on the sand mafia in Karnataka's Kolar District, was found dead under mysterious circumstances at his home in Bengaluru.

metatags.og:title: BlackPak Pro Kayak Fishing Crate - 13" x 16"
metatags.og:description: The original hard-sided kayak crate just got better. A lot better. Introducing the completely redesigned BlackPak Pro.   The result of intense collaboration and more than a year of R&D and design, the BlackPak Pro is fully riggable and boasts a hinged lid, 25% weight reduction, and best-in-class functionality. Enhancements include many things you might have expected, as well as some true-to-the-brand features that no one saw coming.  Size and Weight  The BLP-PRO-13X16 is 13” x 16” x 13” (L,W,H) and weighs in at 7.6 lbs. without TetherTubes and 9.2 lbs. with the included four TetherTubes. The BlackPak Pro also comes in two other sizes, 13”x13” and a 16”x16”.  Construction and Assembly  Injection-molded from UV stabilized polymers, the BlackPak Pro will last for many years, even in harsh marine environments. The ultra-stiff panels utilize a rib structure that offers exceptional rigidity with minimal weight, while their interlocking joints ensure an intuitive, frustration-free assembly process. Int
